alert.note: Alert for McKean; Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 10:12PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MCKEAN...POTTER...AND TIOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1008 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 11 miles south of Hornell to near Kane and moving east at 30 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Cyclone and Kinzua Bridge State Park around 1045 PM EST. Smethport around 1100 PM EST. Coryville around 1105 PM EST. Shinglehouse around 1115 PM EST. Temperatures have dropped below freezing and will continue to fall overnight. Gusty winds from the west at 20 to 30 mph will also occur with the band of snow. Icy spots could form, especially on elevated surfaces such as ramps and bridges. The heavier snow showers will be near Route 6 through the late evening hours. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
